name: Theresa May: Rexit
description:
In this virtual reality experience you play as the prime minister making decisions about how the UK exits the EU. You will make the decisions on a number of topics that relate to Brexit. You have to make sure that you are able to please both the UK and EU or you will be voted out of office from a vote of No Confidence. Will you come to an agreement or will the UK exit with a no deal scenario.

This was made as part of a third year individual project and was displayed at a degree show. Thanks for looking

This version is made specifically for the vive but does work with other Headsets. Contact me if you would like the oculus version
